author: Staff Reporter
text:
: Two police complaints have been filed against Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal for sharing a cartoon on the JNU crisis published in The Hindu on Tuesday.

The complaints were filed by Hindu Sena chief Vishnu Gupta and social activist Ulhas P.R. at the Mandir Marg and New Ashok Nagar stations.

Senior police officers said they had only received written complaints demanding action, but no First Information Reports were registered as the police were probing the allegations.
title: Retweet of cartoon draws complaints
